member.name: T:Lab2.Model.Airport
member.summary: Represents an airport with properties for various details. Implements INotifyPropertyChanged for data binding.

member.name: M:Lab2.Model.Airport.#ctor
member.summary: Default constructor for the Airport class.

member.name: M:Lab2.Model.Airport.#ctor(System.String,System.String,System.DateTime,System.Int32)
member.summary: Parameterized constructor for the Airport class. Initializes airport properties with specified values.
member.param: The unique identifier of the airport.
The city where the airport is located.
The date when the airport was visited.

member.name: E:Lab2.Model.Airport.PropertyChanged
member.summary: Event handler for property changes, required for data binding.

member.name: P:Lab2.Model.Airport.Id
member.summary: Gets or sets the unique identifier of the airport. Triggers property change notification when modified.

member.name: P:Lab2.Model.Airport.City
member.summary: Gets or sets the city where the airport is located. Triggers property change notification when modified.

member.name: P:Lab2.Model.Airport.DateVisited
member.summary: Gets or sets the date when the airport was visited.

member.name: P:Lab2.Model.Airport.Rating
member.summary: Gets or sets the rating of the airport. Triggers property change notification when modified. Validates that the rating is within the range of 1 to 5.

member.summary: Invokes the PropertyChanged event to notify property changes.
member.param: The name of the property that changed.

member.name: M:Lab2.Model.Airport.ToString
member.summary: Returns a formatted string representation of the airport.
member.returns: A string containing airport details.

member.name: T:Lab2.Model.BusinessLogic
member.summary: Implementation of the IBusinessLogic interface for managing airport data and operations.

member.name: P:Lab2.Model.BusinessLogic.Airports
member.summary: Gets an ObservableCollection of airports, bound to the database's SelectAllAirports method.

member.name: M:Lab2.Model.BusinessLogic.#ctor
member.summary: Default constructor initializes the database.

member.name: M:Lab2.Model.BusinessLogic.AddAirport(System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Adds a new airport to the database.
member.param: The unique identifier of the airport.
The city where the airport is located.
The date when the airport was visited.
member.returns: An AirportAdditionError indicating the result of the addition.

member.name: M:Lab2.Model.BusinessLogic.DuplicateAirportAbsent(System.String)
member.summary: Checks if an airport with the given ID already exists in the database.
member.param: The unique identifier of the airport to check.
member.returns: True if the airport with the given ID does not exist; otherwise, false.

member.summary: Deletes an airport from the database by its ID.
member.param: The unique identifier of the airport to delete.
member.returns: An AirportDeletionError indicating the result of the deletion.

member.summary: Edits an existing airport's details.

member.name: M:Lab2.Model.BusinessLogic.CalculateStatistics
member.summary: Calculates and returns statistics based on the number of airports visited by the user.
member.returns: A string containing the user's statistics.
